website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and reliable table top balloon arch.
pros: Flexible glass fiber poles are nearly unbreakable
Add or remove poles to adjust length and height of arch
Kit includes poles, table clamps, and balloon rings
Quick and easy to build with access to video instructions
cons: Clamps don't hold up well on thick tables and may need some tape

customer_reviews.title: After adding tape it finally stayed but in my option the plastic arch that you assemble with the plastic connectors is better.
customer_reviews.text: The holes on the clamps are too big for the arch so I had to add tape & plus the arch kept coming apart so I had to add more tape throughout the arch. After adding tape it finally stayed but in my option the plastic arch that you assemble with the plastic connectors is better.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t make an arch.
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered it because the poles were already connected. In my original thought, I’d figure that would be a lot easier.There are other ones where you have to connect each pole together individually. So yes, it was easier, but I can see why this idea is flawed because it didn’t make an arch. As you can see in the picture, it ended up making this rectangle shape. I would not recommend it if you are looking for that perfect arch. Still disappointed because the manual that came with it shows that perfect arch as well. And the table it is used on in the picture is a 6.5 ft table in case anyone was wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Tuoi

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and Easy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this kit! My balloon arch looked so beautiful at my nieces wedding shower - several people asked me to make one for upcoming events they are hosting. It stayed up perfectly using non-helium balloons. I loved the rings it came with - so you didn't have to tie the balloons together, just slip them on the rings and then slide the ring down the pole. So easy. The hardest part is just tying the knots on the balloons..... Glad I made this purchase and will be looking for some addition balloon related items.
customer_reviews.author: Robin West

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: First time trying to use a balloon arch. It was a little hard at times because the arch kept coming a loose, and we had to tape the clamps on because they were to small to stay on the table but we finally got it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not safe to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the balloon decorating business for 30 years. The system they sent to me did not allow me to anchor the arch section to the table handles. I was not able to secure t safely. If someone bumped into the table it could fall over. Maybe the new system has a better anchoring system. It is not safe to use. The balloons won't hurt nybody but if the arch falls over someone could get injured trying to get away from a falling object. I try new things all the time, this one is not safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: If you love balloon displays, you will love this!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice already, and had so many comments and people wondering where we got this. It's easy to put together, and pretty sturdy. Worth the money spent. The time comsuming part is blowing up the balloons. At the least you will need 84 balloons to fill it up. More if you want it fuller. Makes for a cute back drop for dessert table or gift table. Folds back down easily to put back in the box for easy storage. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for multiple times
customer_reviews.text: Just held a birthday party for my 3-year old son. It was so successful and this one helped a lot! It is very easy to set up with just normal balloons, and after the party I tried to take apart the components and seems it can be reused for my other following events as well! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Tao Xu

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Beware that if you are using a modern day plastic (ours is Cosco) folding table, the chamfered edge means that the clamps will not work. They slipped right off and we had to make an emergency trip to the store for a bunch of clamps the MacGyver it. Cool idea, but most of us aren’t using those cheap cardboard folding tables anymore. I’m just glad we made it work! My tip is to not over-inflate the balloons as that did leave gaps that I had to fill by taping in little balloons (that cause popping as temps started to warm up). Regardless, I’m sure we will use again.
customer_reviews.author: Chalayne H

customer_reviews.title: Forms a perfect arch but need to secure it to the base.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying this because other reviewers said it didn’t form an arch but it formed one fine for me with absolutely no problems. My one suggestion would be if you are using this outdoors or indoors around kids to secure the rod to the base with extra tape (like duct tape) around the base and the balloon bar itself. It looks secured to the table but the bar just kinda sits in the base so it came flying out at us with a strong wind, it was horrifying and popped a ton of balloons. After we re-did the balloons and secured it to the base clip with tape it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! It took 2 of us to do it properly. I didn't have any issues with the poles bending. At first they didn't seem like they were going to bend and I was nervous but my husband assured me they were meant to bend and it would be fine and wouldn't break. They attached easily to the table. I'm surprised by all the bad reviews as we loved this! I can see myself using this again, many times, now that I know how easy it is! For the price I may even order a second one. We did use some clear fishing line to secure it a bit more because it was a very windy day.
customer_reviews.author: The Boos Family

customer_reviews.title: LOVED MY PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this purchase. It made my first time assembling a balloon arch super easy. It attached sturdy to my table. It came with more than enough circular balloon holders (not sure what to call them) Everyone loved it. I will definitely be purchasing another one. I recommend purchasing an electric balloon pump for $20 off of amazon to help make the assembly of the arch quick and easy. I 100% recommend purchasing this for your balloon arch needs. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Clamps were faulty.
customer_reviews.text: The balloon arch itself was great, however, the clamps that came with it were awful. The clamp edging was not long enough to fit under a standard white folding table. We had to clamp them to two wooden chairs we had to rig on each side of the table. Also, one of the clamps BROKE right away, the plastic screw part literally broke in half as I was screwing it in (not hard) I would love to use this arch again because that part was great but I had to chuck the clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Family

customer_reviews.title: really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything, and it is easy to set up. The difference between 4 and 5 stars for me is that some of the plastic clips are a bit sharp and can pop the balloons if you aren't careful. We did a test run the day we got it with some balloons so we can easily set it up in a week for the party. It isn't very hard at all. Great alternative to other balloons, and we can use this year after year and avoid that massive bill on helium filled balloons. Also it is so festive and fun, Our daughter is super excited!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M

customer_reviews.title: A little tricky, but pretty when finished
customer_reviews.text: This balloon arch kit was a little tricky to assemble, but because I read the other reviews I went straight to duct taping to add support to the arch connectors. It looks very professional and we set it up for my daughter's birthday and will re-use it for her graduation with different colored balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Debra V

customer_reviews.title: Only the Arch is usuable
customer_reviews.text: The arch is great and sturdy, but the holders are completely unusable. There isn't a piece that connects the small pole to the large stakes. The instructions actually tell you to use a piece of cardboard to make it sturdier. It doesn't work and I used it indoors. Luckily I had something to help, but if I was outside, I'm not sure what I could have done. The weights are supposed to be filled with water, but it is hard to get the plugs out and a bit difficult to fill. I didnt use those either.
customer_reviews.author: reina609

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to put together and a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as explained and it was such a hit at the 50th birthday party we threw. Everyone thought it was ordered from a florist or party store...that’s how awesome it turned out. It took us a good hour to blow up the balloons and thread them on to the frame but we wanted a lot of balloons on our arch and it could have been done in less time with half the amount of balloons and still would have been impressive. This is a great product so don’t hesitate ordering. We priced out how much it would be to order a balloon arch at a party store nearby and it would have cost $175-$225 for a comparable arch.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: It does work, but comes with great challenges.
customer_reviews.text: This product required other items (masking tape and a rough surface paddine) in order to keep the hook from snapping and flying off the table. Then the medal sections kept slicing into the balloons, so I had to replace those balloons as I went along. I had to add masking tape above and below each metal section to prevent these issues. Finally the project was complete.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Williams

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is nicely put together!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today June 23 2020, and like how small the box is with the items inside neatly. I hope it works well when it is time to use it. I really like it. I took the items out of the box, because I did not believe everything was in the small box. I could not get it back in the box the exact way it was sent. I'm still working at it. I will use this item around the Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to assemble and install balloons!
customer_reviews.text: This contraption made the whole party! It really was a show stopper. The most difficult thing of all was blowing up almost 120 balloons or more and then putting them together in an order that made a nice pattern. With this being my first one, I just let my daughter do what she wanted. I can’t wait to make another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B. Mccabe

customer_reviews.title: No helium no problem
customer_reviews.text: With this unpredictable helium shortage they we’re experiencing I’m glad I bought this balloon arch it. Used it for a baby shower and it was very easy to assemble. Got lots of compliments on the arch as well! I do have experience making a balloon arch without any of the tools provided in this kit but I’m sure that anyone can easily make an arch with all the tools provided.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Turned out beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Requires 2 people to place in vises because too much pressure from curving the arch up on one side will pop the opposite side vise clamp off. Clamps are all plastic and overtightening will result in breakage. Once it was up,it stayed in place well. If clamps were sturdier I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sk0323

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I could tell that the product I received was used. But why complain if it works how it’s supposed to and it isn’t broken? I am happy with the purchase. It did what it was suppose to do. Just be careful not to bend it too much or you’ll send one en flying in the air like I did (Oops!) All parts were accounted for. I’ll attach photos later.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: ... have used this numerous times and it has been easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this numerous times and it has been easy to use. The only type of table you might have trouble clapping it on is a banquet table because the edge is a little bit to big for the clap.
customer_reviews.author: tina nagel-skinner

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it will actually arch
customer_reviews.text: I'm upset because this Arch never made a arch I was forced to do a square and I taped the corners so it stayed,I wanted a arch THATS WHAT I PURCHASED!!the reason I gave one star if any is because the slides for the balloons ends made it easy to make a fill up,but I'll stick with my custom arch by hand
customer_reviews.author: Ebonie wooten

customer_reviews.title: Good price.. great concept but design needs to be improved.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to out together..kind of like a camping tent concept. Spent slot of time sliding the balloons on the curve and then the stick came out of the fitting and all the balloons flew off. It should have some kind of clamp to prevent that from happening. Limited instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Bctrue

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great if it hadn't broke the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item to use for my sons 2020 graduation parade. Unfortunately both plastic brackets that hold the rod broke and the pole started to splinter at the peak of the arch and had to be taped. Please note this was the 1st time we used it. Luckily my sons truck has some metal rings at the bottom of the truck bed for strapping things down and we were able to tire them in because the plastic clamps were not salvageable. What should gave been an enjoyable time decorating his truck for his senior parade was gendered with the stress of having to figure out a way to rig this arch.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up! My son requested a chick-fil-a themed party, and since I couldn’t just purchase decorations at the local party supply store I ordered this. Definitely feel like it was worth every penny. Looked amazing!! I is definitely a two person setup in my opinion, but very easy
customer_reviews.author: Juana

customer_reviews.title: Put on sides of table to create arch
customer_reviews.text: At first I couldn’t figure this out. I was not getting the curve I wanted needless to say, you are supposed to put it on the sides of a table and not the back. But it was nice after we figured it out. I didn’t fill the entire arch, b/c of other decor I needed to show. But okay price and item. It worked. I just hope the part you attach to the table doesn’t strip. You have to twist and turn to adjust it to fit the table
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, blow up balloons night before
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute purchase and I was very happy how it turned out! It was easy to set up. We blew about 80 balloons up with an air pump the night before and kept them inside the house. The shower was outside (85 degrees) so as the day went on the balloons started to pop but it was beautiful most of the day. Excited to make more for other parties!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for multiple events and it’s perfect. It’s fits multiple sizes of tables. We have used it for a balloon arch but we also used it to attach displays to that fit over the table and it’s great. It’s pretty sturdy. We hung a display on it and a doll on each side of it, one of the dolls is in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Blowing the balloons up is the hardest part about the arch itself. Then you just hook 4 balloons on each circle and slide them on the pole. It will take 2 people to clamp the arch to the table. Basically one person on each side doing it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING.  Easy.  Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This made a WONDERFUL decoration for our birthday party. Definitely get the balloon blowing up machine to go with this. So fast, so easy!!! Sturdy!! It was windy and a bit rainy when we set this up. We attached to our deck. It never moved. So cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, but should have gone with my gut instinct. There is absolutely no way the pole can arch the way it looks in the picture. The pole kept coming apart therefore and the fasteners that you attach to the table literally was bending the sturdy foldable table because of the pressure applied by the pole, which popped out of the inserts multiple times. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Apey

customer_reviews.title: WORST PRODUCT EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got to use this Arch Kit only once! This product broke once we places the balloons on its The pole’s kept on popping out of the clamp’s. I had to use tape in order to prevent the pole from popping out of the clamp’s open where you insert the beginning of the pole. The clamp’s are not the proper fit for the pole’s. One of the pole’s split in half and now I’m unable to use it anymore. You can’t even make an arch, the pole’s are not even flexible. The poles keep on detaching. Don’t waste your time buying this product!!! Worst purchase I’ve bought from Amazon ever!!! I want my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. But a small section of the arch broke. However I am keeping it because I was able to just take out that portion and shorten the available footage for the arch by taking all the arch pieces off the cord and then retying the cords. Good for the price, just have the fix method I provided handy in case yours breaks like mine did (during its first use. )
customer_reviews.author: Aburciaga

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: After a terrible experience with another manufacturer, THIS turned out to be Excellent! I am glad I made the purchase. In my excitement I decided to do a trial run on set up and am pleased with the outcome. The picture is the arch that was set up 3 days ago! I feel safe that it will do well at my event this weekend. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Collins

customer_reviews.title: Broken on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my daughters third birthday party and didn’t think to make sure all the pieces worked before we actually went to assemble it on her birthday...well turned out one of clamps at the end of the arch would not open and was broken:/
customer_reviews.author: MariahJ

customer_reviews.title: NOT what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Received completely the wrong item! I ordered An arch, NOT columns! The quality is complete crap anyways. Extremely flimsy and pieces dont have a tight connection. Horrible overall!
customer_reviews.author: Darluv

customer_reviews.title: try to make it like arch, but the plastic sticks are not flexible ...
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't work . I got mine today, try to make it like arch, but the plastic sticks are not flexible and broken easily. I return it right away and won't recommend to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Clamps don't work / broken
customer_reviews.text: VERY unhappy with this purchase! I bought this for a 20th class reunion and when we went to clip it to the table, the clamps would not unscrew/screw to attach them to the table. The part you hold to twist them even broke off! One of our displays was then ugly thanks to this faulty equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome to have when throwing multiple parties!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby shower and it was fun to put up, having popped a few balloons and feeling the little one jump like I do. But we were filling up the balloons and you can customize the arch however you want. Easy to set up and take down. Only issue we had was someone had to hold the clamp on the opposite end when attaching the second end and the arch is full of balloons. But the worst that happened is some of the rings slid off and we just put them back on, problem fixed. Would 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fallon and James Miner

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am fascinated with this product. I bought it for my sister's baby shower. It came on time, it was so easy to assemble, stayed firm all the time, we got a lot of compliments . It looks gorgeous in the middle of all the natural green around.
customer_reviews.author: Steffannie Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking!!
customer_reviews.text: Used outside for a baby shower, the cord snapped a down went the arch! So not happy with this purchase. I typically don't leave negative reviews, but the quality of this item was totally unacceptable. If I could leave negative stars I would. This was money that I literally threw away. So happy I decided not to use it over the cake table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy garland
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble great for my cake table. The only down fall was I put the balloons on the garland and sat it in the sun so they most of them popped. But it was so easy to replace the popped balloons. Could have been fuller but the sun wouldn’t let it be great.
customer_reviews.author: 6ixfooter

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: Went to decorate this morning for the event and the elastic inside is broke the pieces started falling off of it and I can’t get it fixed! What a waste! Now I have to figure out what to do with all these balloons to decorate!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Billie-Jo Gambrell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I've never made a balloon arch before so I was nervous but this is super simple with amazing results! I could've put more air in some of the balloons but since it's for a 3 year old, I knew she wouldn't notice. I did use an electric air pump and this probably took around an hour with the "help" of my teenage daughter.
customer_reviews.author: C Beimfohr

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This was worth every penny. It was so easy to use and we will be able to use it over and over for different occasions. We surprised my daughter for her 16th birthday. Since we are basically quarantined, we wanted her to have something special. This was the perfect touch!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime J.

customer_reviews.title: Loved product but would have liked better clamps.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved using this product. It seems to be the easiest way to build a balloon arch. I built one for a baby shower. I would recommend having someone help slide the balloons into place with you, it just makes it easier. My friend and I attached one end to the clamp and slowly slid all the balloons into place. It came out beautiful! My only complaint is the clamps could be a little more heavy duty. We had to attach clamps to them to keep it from sliding off. Other than that it was a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with Pinterest, this was way easier to use. Assembly super easy, I've used it 3 times in 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can be Manufactured with more flexible material.
customer_reviews.text: The connecting tubes can be made more flexible. One of them snapped. Since it was made with fiber glass material, small almost invisible strands and pierce into your hands and difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so so much! Even had a family member borrow it the day after our party for her little ones party! Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ann Patnaude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Arch-Easy and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product- came in great box that can be reused for storage- it was so easy to use- great quality. I used it two times in less than a week and it was perfect on different sized tables (see above). Absolutely recommend. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great party addition!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together - especially if you have balloon blowers to help you out!! I could have made it fuller than pictured but I used up all my balloons. I thought this added a wonderful luxurious pop to our party decor (no pun intended 😂) for a very good price and I can’t wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with it the first time I tried to use it. The table was too small so there wasn’t enough tension creating the hold the bar in place. It kept popping out. The second time was a hit! It was actually too short for the table so I applied it to the sides of the table and it looks amazing. Will be purchasing a 2nd and maybe 3rd for some other set up ideas I have.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Throw some balloons on it!
customer_reviews.text: This right here is a game changer. Want to take your party to the next level? Shoooot get this right here. Birthdays, weddings, baby showers, divorce party, you name it. My only I guess con is that it was a little hard to do alone. I’d suggest having a partner help you. Also don’t try to blow up all them balloons by mouth. I learned very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Limosnero

customer_reviews.title: Balloon arch
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Just don’t over inflate that balloons then they don’t come together nicely. Alternating sizes of the balloons works the best or else u can see the support pole. I just wish the pole was white instead of black . ( kit is basically tent poles and table clamps and balloons)
customer_reviews.author: Darrel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: First time attempting to make an arch and I’m amazed how easy it was and gives your party a very fancy feel. You attach four balloons in each plastic circle and insure in the sticks and keep doing until your arch is done. Attaches great to table. Definitely worth every penny. I think as I keep doing it I will get better but for my first arch it looked beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Erica Flo

customer_reviews.title: Probably not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry we got a nice gush of Chicago wind, (not extreme or even continuous wind just a gush) and the arch basically ran away..we had to hold it up the remaining of the time because it was unstable by then.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Fiesta

customer_reviews.title: its okay
customer_reviews.text: Its an okay at best product, the clamps don't hold so if you intend to use multiple times I'd suggest that you buy metal replacements, but it turned out okay held up for the party
customer_reviews.author: Franicia

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, loved how easy it was to put together. It does take some time to apply the balloons to the arch, but with the help of others you can get it done in about 10 minutes !
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: This product wasn't what I expected. The clamps wouldn't stay in place no matter how tight you tried to brace them. But over all I was able to use it. I just wouldn't have spend $15.96 again.
customer_reviews.author: CIP

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy and it turned out beautiful! Made the table at my daughter’s 16th birthday party stunning. I will use it over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful arch
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, although it was a pain getting it to stay clipped the table. Either way we figured out a way to get it to grip and it was the hit of the baby shower. Will be using it for other events in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Arch simple
customer_reviews.text: Best arch ever for simple parties. Used it for my childs birthday party and everyone loved the decorations mainly the arch. It is easy to put up due to magnetic and it was overall beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Cammy

customer_reviews.title: Great arch
customer_reviews.text: We had 6ft tables and they were a little too small. The end kept popping off. The clips on the ends tighten which was great. The kit comes with everything that you need (no balloons) and it’s super easy to use. I’m glad that we bought it. We will be using it for other parties.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Manzo

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters birthday and for other birthdays in the future and it’s great!! Super easy to set up and HUGE! Wouldn’t fit on our small round table as we were scared to brake it but fit great on our island! Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the butt!
customer_reviews.text: The directions are very vague. It was so difficult to figure out and there's no way this could extend to the length they're advertising. It looks cute but what a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Danigirl9985

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Balloon Arch
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome!!!! Adds a special touch to any occasion. Easy to assemble just little Time consuming since each balloon needs to blown up but it worth it. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Fermin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, not instructions to set up, I ordered it for my babyshower and it wouldn’t stay up. Lost my money to this because it is out of my return period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniamarte

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. When I tried putting it back to the original box it came in I couldn't put everything back in the original way it came in. I had to separate the ballon supplies into other back .
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a movie night. I created two popcorn boxes out of these big moving boxes we had. Using this balloon arch with yellow and white balloons, it gave our party a great effect. Just make sure you have something to anchor it to because it can't stand on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Caviness

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy, looked great.
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic. It worked out great for my daughters birthday. We used about 80 10” balloons. It could definitely fit more but any less leaves too many gaps. The more balloons the better so you don’t see the support pole. Super easy to assemble but having two people makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Only suggestion is to be able to change the direction of the clamps from horizontal surface to vertical surface. I would also would have loved to be able to use this on other places like a deck railing or gate entrance. But it does say table arch and it is geat gor that and I used it on a bench and it looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was really a great buy for my baby shower. It was easy to assemble and to use. I really liked the addition of the table ends to secure the arch so it didn’t wobble. Very happy overall and highly recommend getting this!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Warning.  Read first
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this garbage. Went to install it and started to arc the rods and had one explode. Now picking fiberglass Out of my hand for 2 days. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: RF IN NY

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Eas to use and assemble Cons: It’s adjustable to a certain limit/ needed to be more flexible/ wish the plastic was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: D Law

customer_reviews.title: Not the most sturdy arch kit but it works if you are looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the most sturdy arch kit but it works if you are looking for a budget friendly decoration options. I used it for my son's birthday party and it looked good after the balloons were set up. It could be a little tricky to assemble when you first start but once you get a hang of it, it wasn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great balloon arch
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this product. It was super easy to put up. It was easy to attach the balloons to the clips and slip them on the arch. It is was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Ok this turned out amazing. It was a 2 man job for me. If you have someone to help you I recommend. It would've took my forever if I didnt have help. I still think it's pretty cool and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Byers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and broken!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this product. Cheaply made Came broken decided to work with it cause I needed it and broke even more!!! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a drive thru baby shower. I didn’t install enough balloons but that was a user error not an issue with the arch. It was a big hit
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bagent

customer_reviews.title: Amazing arch amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use once you read directions Just make sure you’re careful you don’t want to snap any of the rods I highly recommend having an additional person help you while adding balloons to arch.
customer_reviews.author: mani

customer_reviews.title: Worked as it should
customer_reviews.text: Worked great exactly as it should we even put it together the night before the party and took it to the place where the party was held just had to push the connections back together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Made a perfect balloon arch. Everything needed to make the arch is included (except the balloons). I never thought I could make a balloon arch; I did with this. The arch stayed on the table with zero problems. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product!!! I would have given it 0 stars.Do not waste your money!! Does not keep it's shape. I even tried duct tape and it still collapsed. Couldn't handle the weight of BALLOONS!!! I am so glad I was testing it out to put photos up and offer to clients. I would have been mortified if this happened on site for a client. Do not buy! Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: This product is used for a ballon arch but I don’t think it came with all of the parts. It didn’t have the pieces for the balloons. However, it shows the pieces in the picture. I have not put it together yet so I’m not quite sure how easy or difficult it is to Assemble.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and it turned out so cute for my daughters first birthday. We had many comments and compliments on it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dru-Ann Owens

customer_reviews.title: It looks so good!!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy and took me about an hour to do. Why pay hundreds of dollars to have someone to do this when you can do it yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: My kids already knew how to use and set this product up. They had my table set very fast. Will be saving for other events
customer_reviews.author: A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality .
customer_reviews.text: Broke in first use , had to tape it , not good for a 4 ft table , too much pressure on the arch make it broke ;(
customer_reviews.author: layara

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but needs some fixing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and it’s easy to work with, but Within and hour of set up, the top part popped out of the socket which instead of creating an arched, it looked more like an upside down v. We left it alone and later through the night, a piece broke off from the same part. And it also came already looking used/ old.
customer_reviews.author: tristen

customer_reviews.title: Pole comes out of clamps at times
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Issue was if it's not a flat surface the clamps are hard to keep in there. Then occasionally the pole wants to come out of the clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: works, but one side was not ridged and slid off the table so my husband made some grooves and worked fine after
customer_reviews.author: bunny mom

customer_reviews.title: ease and breeze
customer_reviews.text: simple to assemble, including filling of about 100 balloons took approx 1.5 hours. simple design and reusable if you save the clips. Only two down falls i found when assembling first I reccomend using an electic compressor to fill up the balloons for speed and efficiency. Second be mindful of how full you fill the balloons as when assembling it will compress some of them causing others to pop.
customer_reviews.author: Latia Labone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Its worth having if you are going to have party yearly you design it With how many balloons you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Boobie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to put this together for my sisters baby shower, and i wanted to make sure all pieces weren't touched until the party so I left it in prepackaged box. The day of the party I took the materials out of the package and realized that the table clamps were cheap plastic and the screws were so tight and unable to screw off without breaking them. I ended up not being able to use this. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We used this balloon arch for our outdoor high school graduation. Everyone loved it. The graduates walked underneath it and stopped to take pictures. It made the decor so much better. Just make sure to tighten clamps well and you need 2 people to put it up. . Have some extra balloons on hand, we lost one on the right side. Overall beautiful arch and easy to put together. I can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This product suck, I bought because I decorate parties, this did not want to stay on any of the tables, it’s very cheap and a waste of money! I would put zero stars I literally had to stick it in the ground because it broke, the elastic on this thing is terrible! And that’s the result,
customer_reviews.author: Keniesha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stores easily.
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to use. The clamps were a bit hard to use but then again u have a hard time with my grip. I would buy it again if I misplace or break a piece from mine. A storage case would be nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use could not have done it without it I have not used a arch before but will not decorate without it
customer_reviews.author: wendy adkison

product_meta.title: LANGXUN 12ft Table Balloon Arch Kit For Birthday Decorations, Party,Wedding and Graduation Decorations, Christmas Decorations Baby Shower Bachelor Party Supplies
feature_bullets: With The Single Length Is 15 Inches High Strength Glass Fiber Pole, Bending Is Not Easy To Break. And It Comes With Two C-Shaped Plastic Clips. 10 Adjustable Poles, Total Length Of 12 Feet. Can Reduce The Number Of Pole, Adjustment The Size Of The Balloon Arch.

You Need To Buy 120 Or So Latex Balloons Separately. Balloon Quantity May Vary As Much As 20% Depending On How Tightly The Balloon Clusters Are Packed. It Is Recommended To Use Balloons Of 5 To 10 Inches.

This Balloon Arch Kit Is A Perfect Decoration For Party Photo Booth, Weddings, Bridal Events, Graduation, Birthday Decoration, Candy Buffets, Dessert Tables, Boy & Girl Baby Showers, Christmasdecoration, New Years Decoration And More. You Can Reuse It On Various Occasions.
Can Be Clamped To A Table Or Weighted Item Placed On The Floor. You Can Use Your Imagination To Create A Unique Arch.Whether Indoors Or Outdoors, It Is A Perfect Decoration.
This Will Be A Shopping Without Worry.If The Product You Receive Has Any Quality Problems, Is Not Satisfied Or Damaged In Use, Only Contact Us, We Will Give You 100% Unconditional Refund.
